title: "Nothing Says 'Fantasy' Like Risk Management"
description: Hot Takedown unravels the logic behind fantasy football and weighs potential outcomes for the 2019-20 EPL title race. Plus, a Rabbit Hole on historic baseball upsets.
itunes:title: "Nothing Says 'Fantasy' Like Risk Management"
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
itunes:subtitle: Hot Takedown unravels the logic behind fantasy football and weighs potential outcomes for the 2019-20 EPL title race. Plus, a Rabbit Hole on historic baseball upsets.
